Features.StoriesManager.description-$1-g: Fonio is a tool aimed at building rich html pages featuring text and interactive assets such as visualizations and videos.
Features.StoriesManager.description-$2-f: Write your story, then save it locally or export it on the web on your personal spaces or on common servers.
Features.StoriesManager.about-forccast: Fonio is made in the frame of the FORCCAST project, a series of pedagogical experiments about the cartography of controversies, a new approach to socio-technical issues through simulation and web analysis.
Features.StoriesManager.about-medialab: Fonio was built at médialab, a research center aiming at connecting social sciences to new digital tools and methods.
Features.StoriesManager.or-continue-loca: ... or continue with a browser-stored story
Features.StoriesManager.import-project-f: ... or import a project from your computer
Features.StoriesManager.your-file-is-bad: your file is not formatted properly
Features.StoriesManager.your-file-is-not: your file is not a valid story
Features.StoriesManager.the-url-did-not-: the url you provided does not point to a valid story
Features.StoriesManager.the-gist-is-not-: the gist is not formatted properly
Features.StoriesManager.you-seem-to-have: you seem to already have a version of this story stored on this browser
Features.StoriesManager.do-you-wish-to-o: Do you wish to override the browser-stored version of your story with the one you are trying to import?
Features.StoriesManager.override-existin: yes, override the existing browser-stored version of this story

Features.TakeAway.project-file-help: will download a project file, which allows you to re-import this story later or on another browser
Features.TakeAway.markdown-file-help: markdown is a lightweight markup language that you can use to edit your story content in other software
Features.TakeAway.html-file-help: it will download an autonomous html file that can be uploaded on any server
